data.quote: A dream is not something that you wake up from, but something that wakes you up
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: All of our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Ambition is success' best friend
data.author: Unkwown

data.quote: Anything you do vividly imagine, ardently desire, sincerely believe, and enthusiastically act upon must come to reality
data.author: Unkwown

data.quote: Believe in yourself and you will be unstoppable
data.author: Unkwown

data.quote: Believe that you have it, and you will have it
data.author: Unkwown

data.quote: Cause change and lead; accept change and surive; resist change and die
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Commit yourself to lifelong learning. The most valuable asset you will ever have is your mind and what you put into it
data.author: Unkwown

data.quote: Courage is facing your fears. Stupidity is fearing nothing.
data.author: Unkwown

data.quote: Creativity means believing you have greatness
data.author: Unkwown

data.quote: Decide what is worthwhile and follow through with it
data.author: Unkwown

data.quote: Do extraordinary things; don't just dream them
data.author: Unkwown

data.quote: Do not settle for less than an extraordinary life
data.author: Unkwown

data.quote: Don't limit your challenges; challenge your limits
data.author: Unkwown

data.quote: Dreams are the reality of tomorrow
data.author: Unkwown

data.quote: Effort equals results, enthusiasm creates action.
data.author: Unkwown

data.quote: Exceed expectations. We are not driven to do extraordinary things, but to do ordinary things extraordinarily well
data.author: Unkwown

data.quote: Excellence is not being the best; it is doing your best
data.author: Unkwown

data.quote: Experience tells you what to do. Confidence allows you to do it
data.author: Unkwown

data.quote: Focus on where you want to go, not where you currently are
data.author: Unkwown

data.quote: Good things come to those who hustle while they wait
data.author: Unkwown
